client.agreeToShareData: I give permission to use the data I have provided for my application and, if applicable, to share it with a partner organization

create.title: Make an appointment
create.introduction: Our support is for all entrepreneurs who live or have their business in one of the following municipalities:
create.residenceWorkHeading: Where do you live and work?
create.locationValidationError: Registration not possible. You can only register for Entrepreneur Central if you live in the Utrecht region and/or if your business is located there.
create.signupError: It is not possible to make an appointment because an appointment has already been made with this email address.

clientCreated.ok: Your details have been successfully processed. You will receive an email with a link to make an appointment.
clientCreated.noEmailReceived: Didn't receive an email? Use the button below to resend it

pick.title: Make an appointment
pick.linkInvalid: The link used is not valid.
pick.created: You have made an appointment on
pick.invalidLink: The link used is invalid. Enter your email address to send a new link. If your email address is known to us, you will receive a new link.
pick.signUpAgain: If you haven't received an email, please register again.
